definition: to confer a title upon sb/to dub/to crown/to invest with rank or title
the Other List (Qing dynasty register of outlaws)/a blacklist of undesirables

sentences.english: Creative sketchbook allows you to draw websites and web apps.
sentences.chinese: 很有创意的速写册，可供你画出网址和网页应用软件。

sentences.english: This book is in six volumes.
Of the top payroll teams, only the Mavs are getting production equal to the investment.
sentences.chinese: 薪水册顶端的球队中，只有小牛的产出对得起投入。

sentences.english: Here is the hotel service information  booklet.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们宾馆的服务信息册。

sentences.english: Professor Hunter have a library of about five thousand book.
sentences.chinese: 汉特教授约有五千册藏书。

sentences.english: Mocky, this comic book looks more interesting.
sentences.chinese: 莫奇，这本连环漫画册看起来更有趣。

sentences.english: We have eight thousand books, many of them are rare and valuable.
sentences.chinese: 我们的图书馆有八千册图书，很多都是善本和珍本。

sentences.english: VOLUME】Our school has a library of 100,000 volumes.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校拥有一所藏书十万册的图书馆。

sentences.english: Hundreds and thousands of books and magazines doze in the library.
sentences.chinese: 上千上万册图书杂志在图书馆里“睡大觉”。

sentences.english: The Well-Tempered Clavier (24), collection of preludes & fugues, Book II.
sentences.chinese: 平均律钢琴集24首，收集的前奏曲和赋格，第2册。

sentences.english: IPSC competitions are governed by the rules in this rulebook.
sentences.chinese: IPSC竞赛概由本规则册所载之内容规范之。

sentences.english: We have a great list with thousands assortments of abdominoplasty .
sentences.chinese: 我们有一个伟大的腹壁品种数千册。

sentences.english: Now concerning Moses the man of God， his sons were named of the tribe of Levi.
sentences.chinese: 至于神人摩西，他的子孙名字记在利未支派的册上。

sentences.english: I chose NEW CONCEPT ENGLISH and learned up from book 1 to 4.
sentences.chinese: 我选择的《新概念英语》，并学完了1至4册。

sentences.english: Valentine, 9762, was registered on the books "Pardoned by Governor, " and Mr.
sentences.chinese: 范林丁，9762号，已经登记在“州长赦免册”中。

definition: books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
the amount of books etc printed at one impression/print run
a series of books/a collection of books
to set in print/to diffuse/to publish
book format, similar to in-4°, in-8° etc (a 16-kai format 16開|16开[shi2 liu4 kai1] is roughly A4)/abbr. to 開|开[kai1]
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
